lines.text: If he came in here right now, he'd kill us both.
Forget about him.
Who?
You've got about as much style as a bowl of turnips.
Blow that bughouse bastard to kingdom come!

[violently accosting a racist guard]
This uppity nigger is buying you a drink!
[flushes his head down the toilet]
[Frenchy has just broken Owney's watch]
You cheap son of a bitch! You only offered $500 for me?
What?
If you were kidnapped, I wouldn't offer more than that for you!
That's what I heard!
50 grand! I paid 50 grand! They only wanted 35 but I gave 50 not to hurt you. $500. I would've given 500,000 for you. I been worried sick about you. Look at what you done to my fuckin' watch.
50 grand?
Yeah.
[Frenchy hands Owney a box that Owney opens]
What's this? A platinum watch. (smiling) You asshole.
I was born looking 18.
I can save you.
No, you can't.
In the next room, gentlemen, is the finest food, drink and pussy in New York at a price.
Someone oughta take out your brain and pickle it!
I'm surprised at you! Don't you feel anything for Mr. Flynn at all? He's dead!
Mr. Flynn was a bootlegger. That's how they live in this world. Maybe one day you'll wise up, sap!
Anything you need, Dutch?
Yeah, why don't you bring me the moon, Frenchy?
Baby, you may be passin' for white, but you ain't invisible.
[a boy runs up to Dixie in the street]
Vincent's been telling everyone around here that you saved the Dutchman's ass!
I sing, tell a few jokes.
Tell me a joke.

[laughs]
Hello, sucker.
What do they call you?
Nobody calls me nothin'.
Not even your mother?
I didn't have a mother. They found me in a garbage pail.
